last_messages.content:
Perfect! I've successfully updated the README.md with all the planned changes. Here's a summary of what was updated:

## ✅ Changes Completed

1. **Added LLM-Powered Emotional Analysis section** (line 35)
   - Introduced EmoLLMs with 80%+ accuracy
   - Added real-time processing pipeline diagram

2. **Updated Phase 1 to LLM Integration** (line 111)
   - Changed focus to LLM setup first
   - Added EmoLLama-chat-13b installation
   - Included code example for LLM analyzer

3. **Updated Phase 2 title and content** (line 151)
   - Emphasized "Proven Methods" 
   - Listed validated results (68.2% compression, 72.8ms processing)
   - Referenced research papers

4. **Enhanced Performance Targets** (line 207)
   - Added LLM emotion detection: 80-85% accuracy
   - Included total pipeline timing: ~300ms

5. **Replaced Usage Example** (line 216)
   - Shows complete pipeline from .claude → LLM → Quantum → Storage
   - Realistic async processing example
   - Demonstrates all proven components

6. **Updated Research Foundation** (line 263)
   - Added EmoLLMs as primary reference
   - Emphasized all methods are validated
   - Listed specific proven results

7. **Added Hardware Resource Allocation** (line 275)
   - GPU memory breakdown: 4.3GB quantum, 2.5GB LLM
   - RAM allocation details
   - Added Dependencies section

8. **Updated Next Steps** (line 313)
   - Practical steps to get started
   - Includes LLM model download
   - References monitoring dashboard

The README now clearly shows a **proven, practical implementation** that combines:
- ✅ State-of-the-art LLM emotional analysis (80%+ accuracy)
- ✅ Your validated quantum methods (68% compression, 42% coherence)
- ✅ Real-time processing pipeline
- ✅ No experimental features

Ready to start implementing this proven system! 💙
